channel.title: Psycho King doesn't show as winner when he wins
channel.description:
#### What happened? Reaper became King, won with Alchemist, showed Alchemist win only on splash screen. Both actually won and got the gold
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Should at least show "King and Alchemist win"
#### Steps to reproduce: Presumably get a psycho king to win with an alchemist.
#### Comments:

item.title: Psycho King doesn't show as winner when he wins
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
Oh hey! I was that Reaper/Psycho King! Can confirm I had the same bug, it just said “The Alchemist Wins.”
Edit: Here’s a screenshot for proof
https://i.gyazo.com/08b53850eacf92a1e283c5e0399479fd.png
I did receive gold and the postgame screen treated it like a win.

Read full topic
item.source: Psycho King doesn't show as winner when he wins

item.title: Psycho King doesn't show as winner when he wins
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
What happened?

Reaper became King, won with Alchemist, showed Alchemist win only on splash screen.
Both actually won and got the gold

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Should at least show “King and Alchemist win”

Steps to reproduce:

Presumably get a psycho king to win with an alchemist.

Comments:

Read full topic
item.source: Psycho King doesn't show as winner when he wins
